text:
SALEM

Ramakrishna Mission Ashram: Bhagavan Sri Ramakrishna Jayanthi, homam, 10.30 a.m.; discourse by Swami Yatatmananda, 11.30 a.m., by Narai S. Nellaippan, 6.30 p.m.

Employment Provident Fund Organisations: PF grievances day meeting, for subscribers, Sub-Regional office premises, Swarnapuri, 10.30 a.m. to 1 p.m.; employers 3 p.m. to 4 p.m.; exempted establishments, 4 p.m.

Department of Commerce of Periyar University and NABARD: International conference on ‘corporate and business response to climate change: from awareness to adoption’, panel discussion, 10 a.m.; technical sessions, 11.45 a.m. and 2 p.m.

Sri Ganesh College of Education: Training programme on role of youths in the development of the country, A. K. P. Kathirvel, chief guest, M. Thangavel, Correspondent, presides, 10.30 a.m.

The Kavery Educational Institutions, Mecheri: Placement and training cell, on-campus drive, 10 a.m.

Salem College of Engineering and Technology: Department of Training and Placement, on-campus drive by Energy Efficient Lights, Bengaluru, R. A. Sankaran, principal, presides, 10 a.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Thangam Pattu Maaligai showroom, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

New Century Book House Limited: Book exhibition, Bose maidan, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Gnanamani Educational Institutions: Campus recruitment drive by Pothigai Power Solutions Private Limited, Chennai, T. Arangannal, Chairman, presides, 10 a.m.

Paavai Engineering College: Seminar on industry expectations from engineering students, Hareni Jagadeesan, Centre Head, Livewire, Salem, chief guest, 10 a.m.

Gnanamani College of Engineering: All India conference on “emerging and sustainable technologies for infrastructure, communication, computing and electrical network developments”, P. Shanmugam, Senior Principal Scientist, Central Leather Research Institute (CLRI), Chennai, chief guest, 10 a.m.

Paavai Polytechnic College: NSS special camp, Panchayat Union Elementary School, Kurukkupuram, 3 p.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Cooptex showroom, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

ERODE

Kongu Engineering College: Inauguration of ENTHUSA’'16 - Cultural Event, 9.35 a.m.

Nandha Engineering College: Legal awareness on ‘Women Related Laws’, talk by T. Malar Valantina, Chief Judicial Magistrate, Erode, and G. Bhuvaneshwari, First Additional Sub Judge; V. Shanmugan, Chairman, Sri Nandha Educational Trust, presides, 9.30 a.m.

Erode Sengunthar Engineering College: ISTE - Knowledge-Sharing Session on 'Gi-Fi Giga Byte Wireless Technology' by G. Lalli, Assistant Professor, 4.40 p.m.
title: engagements
